docs.snippet: A former Texas special education teacher, described by a colleague as a "gentle giant," fatally shot four people including his estranged wife and current girlfriend, in a spasm of apparent domestic violence, police said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former Texas special education teacher, described by a colleague as a "gentle giant," fatally shot four people including his estranged wife and current girlfriend, in a spasm of apparent domestic violence, police said on Thursday.

headline.main: Texas Gunman Accused of Killing Wife, Girlfriend, Two Others
headline.print_headline: Texas Gunman Accused of Killing Wife, Girlfriend, Two Others

docs.snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo hit back at critical former boss Jose Mourinho in the best way possible on Wednesday with two goals to help Real Madrid beat Chelsea 3-1 and win the International Champions Cup pre-season tournament....

headline.main: Ronaldo Scores Twice as Real Beat Chelsea in Friendly

docs.snippet: Treble winners Bayern Munich launch their Bundesliga title defence against Borussia Moenchengladbach on Friday but league rivals and football fans across German are already talking about a foregone conclusion....

docs.snippet: Rafael Nadal returned to action for the first time since his first-round loss at Wimbledon and defeated Jesse Levine, 6-2, 6-0, at the Rogers Cup....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal returned to action for the first time since his first-round loss at Wimbledon and defeated Jesse Levine, 6-2, 6-0, at the Rogers Cup.
docs.abstract: Rafael Nadal defeats Jesse Levine in second round of Rogers Cup tennis tournament; other tournament developments noted.

headline.main: Nadal, Still a Fan Favorite, Prevails in First Match Since Wimbledon

docs.snippet: Although he has vowed to fight on, Silvio Berlusconi's conviction for tax fraud has fuelled speculation that his eldest daughter Marina, head of his $6.6 billion business empire, could take his place as leader of the centre-right in Italy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Although he has vowed to fight on, Silvio Berlusconi's conviction for tax fraud has fuelled speculation that his eldest daughter Marina, head of his $6.6 billion business empire, could take his place as leader of the centre-right in Italy.

headline.main: As Berlusconi Star Fades, Daughter Marina Tipped as New Leader
headline.print_headline: As Berlusconi Star Fades, Daughter Marina Tipped as New Leader

docs.snippet: About 40 percent of white Americans and about 25 percent of non-white Americans are surrounded exclusively by friends of their own race, according to an ongoing Reuters/Ipsos poll....

headline.main: Many Americans Have No Friends of Another Race: Poll

docs.snippet: A former teacher and Dallas Mavericks hip-hop dancer was charged with capital murder Thursday after police said he attacked the homes of his estranged wife and his girlfriend, killing the women and two of their children and wounding four other peo...
docs.lead_paragraph: A former teacher and Dallas Mavericks hip-hop dancer was charged with capital murder Thursday after police said he attacked the homes of his estranged wife and his girlfriend, killing the women and two of their children and wounding four other people.

headline.main: Ex-Teacher Charged in Dallas-Area Attacks; 4 Dead
headline.print_headline: Ex-Teacher Charged in Dallas-Area Attacks; 4 Dead

docs.snippet: Looking beyond the problems of a region beset by regime change in Egypt, a security crisis in Yemen and civil war in Syria, international investors are seeking out well-run businesses in Middle Eastern and even some North African stock markets....
docs.lead_paragraph: Looking beyond the problems of a region beset by regime change in Egypt, a security crisis in Yemen and civil war in Syria, international investors are seeking out well-run businesses in Middle Eastern and even some North African stock markets.

headline.main: Investors Undeterred by Middle East and North Africa Crises
headline.print_headline: Investors Undeterred by Middle East and North Africa Crises
